page.title: 18Entertainment in Silverdale
page.content: Once Silverdale had a cinema,a dance hall and four bowling greens.There were also many pubs.Now people mostly go to Newcastle-Under-Lyme or Hanley to seek entertainment.The local working mensÂ£ clubs are very popular with special evenings and organised outings.The local churches and chapels have many special interest groups that adults can enjoy in their spare time. Children in Silverdale might amuse them -selves by joining a Youth Club or the local branch of the Scouts or Guides.We can all enjoy a game of tennis,putting or bowls in the local park,and there is a swings and play area for the smaller children.During the Summer holiday the Police Force have organised a special events scheme called S.P.A.C.E.in which there are lots of fun and sports to keep the children busy.There are many competitions and visits to enjoy.
